flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project consists of three nestling boxes connected by axles on the two axes. attached to the smallest box is the gameboard, made of plywood with holes drilled through and guide walls glued on. knobs on two side of the outer box connect to axles underneath the gameboard. String is wrapped around the axles and then attached to the inner boxes to tip the board in both directions. A tilted bottom is attached underneath this to catch the ball when it falls through the holes and funnel it to a hole in the side.

guide.summary: A wooden 3D maze where you guide a marble around holes to the finish, using walls to help you. It is controlled by two knobs that control the axis and tip the table, which is on gimbles.
guide.title: Marble Maze
